Name: Space Yugoslav 2D
About the game: Game analysis: Space Yugoslav is an old school 2D shooter where you play as a bounty hunter named Nada. Survive another day/night at your very risky job and get back home with your space Stoyadin in one piece. Mission statement: Your mission is to save non-alignment space colonies from space police raids. Escape bullets, shoot the police out of the colonies, earn some extra money, drive your Stoyadin through space and get back to your love at home, as soon as possible. Controls: Gamepad/joystick, keyboard, with extra mouse option for shooting FULL CONTROLLER SUPPORT! TESTED BY HUNDREDS OF PLAYERS ON REBOOT WEEKEND 2022 GAMING FAIR: November 12th and 13th, 2022 - Zagrebački Velesajam, Zagreb, Croatia, EU Thank you everyone for coming to the Reboot Weekend gaming fair! Space Yugoslav 2D was played by hundreds of players, we also gave prizes to those who were the first to complete it! We received very positive and high-quality feedback! It is priceless to see so many smiling faces of all ages, while having fun playing what you have been creating for months. Special thanks to the entire Reboot powered by A1 organization of the festival for enabling us to present our game live, to Pismo entrepreneurial incubator for lending laptops, Lea Ćurić for plush stoyadins and of course to all colleagues for these wonderful two days. Space Yugoslav 2D was presented as the final project for conclusion of 7th generation educational program 'INKUBATOR - PISMO' for 'Unity/C# game developer'. It was made during three months period in collaboration between: Programming and story: Sonja Hranjec Graphics: Ivana Vidović & Sonja Hranjec Music: Faraon Slavko Mentor: Dominik Cvetkovski (c)2022. - Affordable Care Games
